message: I propose we divide the money in a 3:1 ratio. This offers a fair compromise considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more considering the decreasing value of money. Let's see if you can do better.
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal division of the remaining funds. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the diminishing value of money in each subsequent round.
